Polyglot_eval.description: Executes code in a foreign language identified by its ID

Polyglot_eval_file_by_id.description: Executes code in a foreign language from a file, identified by its ID

Polyglot_eval_file.description: Executes code in a foreign language from a file, automatically determining the language

Polyglot_export_value.description: Exports a value with a given name to other languages

Polyglot_import_value.description: Imports and returns a value with a given name exported by other languages

Java_type.description: Returns a Java class object, given its name
